entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 6:30 PM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon then periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:30 PM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then partly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 6:30 PM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023
